FuncDef: The display pim ipv6 routing-table command displays information about an IPv6 PIM routing table. The display pim ipv6 routing-table command displays information about an IPv6 PIM routing table. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.
CLIs: display pim ipv6 routing-table [ <groupAddr> [ mask <group-mask-length> ] | <srcAddr> [ mask <source-mask-length> ] | incoming-interface { { <iif-port-type> <iif-port-num> | <iif-port-name> } | register } | outgoing-interface { include | exclude | match } { { <oif-port-type> <oif-port-num> | <oif-port-name> } | register | none } | mode { ssm | sm } | flags { act | del | exprune | ext | loc | niif | nonbr | none | rpt | sg_rcvr | sgjoin | spt | swt | upchg | wc | excl } | fsm ] [ outgoing-interface-number [ <oif-number> ] ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the IPv6 address of a multicast group.
The address is in the format of X:X:X:X:X:X:X:X.

Specifies the mask length of a multicast group.
The value is an integer.The mask length of the address of a multicast group ranges from 8 to 128.

Specifies the mask length of a multicast source.
The value is an integer. The mask length of the address of a multicast source ranges from 0 to 128.

Specifies the IPv6 address of a multicast source.
The address is in the format of X:X:X:X:X:X:X:X.

Displays the PIM routing entries with specified upstream interfaces.
-

Displays the PIM routing entries with specified upstream interfaces.
-

Displays information about a register interface.
-

Displays the PIM routing entries with specified downstream interfaces.
-

Displays the (S, G) routing entries with a specified downstream interface included.
If this keyword is set, the type and number of an interface must be specified.

Displays the (S, G) routing entries with a specified downstream interface excluded.
If this keyword is set, the type and number of an interface must be specified.

Displays the (S, G) routing entries with the downstream interfaces being a specified interface.
If the type and number of the interface is not specified, the (S, G) routing entries with no downstream interfaces are displayed.

Displays the PIM routing entries with specified downstream interfaces.
-

Displays the PIM routing entries with no downstream interfaces.
-

Displays Protocol Independent Multicast-Source-Specific Multicast (PIM-SSM) routing entries.
-

Displays Protocol Independent Multicast-Sparse Mode (PIM-SM) routing entries.
-

Indicates the type of a routing entry.
The type flag of entries can be the following values:
actdelexpruneextlocniifnonbrnonerptsg_rcvrsgjoinsptswtupchgwcexcl

Indicates the details of FSM states.
-

Displays the IPv6 PIM routing entries with a specified number of downstream interfaces.
-
